page.title: 18Industry in Kelso
page.content: The industrial estate in Kelso is at Pinnacle Hill. There are a lot of factories there and some of them are Neves, Keltek and Forbes. The people in the factories earn good wages and a lot of people work there. The factory workers make things like light bulbs, computers and knitwear. The factories in our industrial estate do not spread pollution but other towns are not so lucky. Some of the people who work at the factories do night shift and they sleep in the daytime instead of at night. At the industrial estate there are a lot of big vans and dozens of cars. It is the only industrial estate in Kelso. A lot of people who work there do not like their jobs very much but they have to stay there because they might not get a job anywhere else. 8 parents of children in our class work in the industrial estate.
